data.name: Days of War
data.detailed_description:
Days of War is still in development


That means there isn't a ton of content, some completed features are not yet in the game, and servers are quiet. We've got a small but dedicated team currently hard at work on reinventing Days of War.

In the near future there will be a major update with lots of new content, features, and performance enhancements.

If you want to be a part of the development journey and help make Days of War a better game, we invite you to join us in Early Access. If you are expecting a finished game we recommend you wishlist us and join our steam group to stay up to date while we march towards release.

We're going to keep plugging away until we've gotten Days of War to a place where we can all be proud of. Take a look at our roadmap for more details.
data.about_the_game:
Days of War is still in development


That means there isn't a ton of content, some completed features are not yet in the game, and servers are quiet. We've got a small but dedicated team currently hard at work on reinventing Days of War.

We're going to keep plugging away until we've gotten Days of War to a place where we can all be proud of. Take a look at our roadmap for more details.
data.short_description: Days of War expands on the team based, close quarters, non-stop action of classic WW2 multiplayer shooters. Days of War is currently in development, please read the description below before purchasing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64), Windows 8 (x64), Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2600k CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
